movie.title: Mandela
movie.plot: Nelson Mandela becomes South Africa's first Black President, and was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for his leadership in negotiating a bloodless revolution in that country.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 6 wins & 4 nominations.
